word_mean: 焦油：暗棕色或黑色粘稠液体，烧烤各种松木可以取得，或为分解蒸馏烟煤的副产品，成分复杂，可用来制取很多物质，如煤酚、木馏油、愈创木酚、萘、石蜡、苯酚、甲苯、二甲苯等。早年曾用于慢性支气管炎、腹泻和泌尿系统疾病的治疗，现则只限于某些皮肤病，主要如银屑病和慢性湿疹性损害

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English teru, teoru, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch teer, German Teer, and perhaps ultimately to tree
mid 17th cent.: perhaps an abbreviation of tarpaulin, also used as a nickname for a sailor at this time

entry.def: Tar is a thick black sticky substance that is used especially for making roads.

example.ex: The oil has hardened to tar...
They drove across the river to New Hampshire on a hot tar road.
example.tran: 他们沿着一条滚烫的柏油路开过了河，来到新罕布什尔州。

entry.def: Tar is one of the poisonous substances contained in tobacco.

entry.tran: 被当作一丘之貉;被当成一路货色
entry.def: If some people in a group behave badly and if people then wrongly think that all of the group is equally bad, you can say that the whole group is tarred with the same brush .

example.ex: I am a football supporter and I have to often explain that I'm not one of the hooligan sort because we'll all get tarred with the same brush when there's trouble.
example.tran: 我是足球迷，经常要解释我不是那种足球流氓，因为一旦出事，我们就会被当成是一路货色。
